periodogram module

periodogram.calculatePowerSpectralDensity(sig, fs, noverlap, NFFT=2048, scale_by_freq=True)

Calculate power spectral density

Parameters

  • sig – Signal

  • fs – Sampling frequency

  • noverlap – Overlap

  • NFFT – Number of FFT points

  • scale_by_freq – Scale by frequency

Returns

psd_sig, f_psd_sig, Pow_Delta_ratio, Pow_Theta_ratio, Pow_Alpha_ratio, Pow_Beta_ratio, Pow_Sigma_ratio

periodogram.plotPowerSpectralDensity(figure=None, axis=None, sig=None, filtering_status=True, lowcut=0.3, highcut=30)

Plot power spectral density

Parameters

  • fig – figure

  • axis – axis

  • sig – Signal

  • filtering_status – Apply filtering?

  • lowcut – highcut of filtering

  • highcut – lowcut frequency of filtering
